level.heading: Separate office of bank.
level.text: A branch or separate office of a bank is a separate bank for the purpose of computing the time within which and determining the place at or to which action may be taken or notice or orders must be given under this article and under Article 3.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-249
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-249, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 28:4-101.
